articles.title: Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide stock market action on Wednesday
articles.description: Indian markets closed lower amid profit-taking in consumer and IT stocks, though metals and PSU banks gained on optimism over U.S.-China trade progress and potential FII limit hike.
articles.content: The Indian market ended lower on Tuesday as broad-based profit-taking dragged down the Sensex and Nifty, offsetting strength in metal and public sector bank stocks. Consumer and IT shares led the dec… [+4030 chars]
